mapinfo.detailsText:
Wadmalaw island is a part of Johns Island in South Carolina. This land map got 3 trading posts in the west side of the map where there are usually a lot of resources. The east side of the map is surrounded by water where there is the possibility for discovering the new world, and maybe some other islands ! 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCiv: Seminoles 
 -Outlaws: Renegado / Pistolero 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Rikikipu 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
